question: Plant cells and animal cells have identical organelles and structures.

explanation.en: While plant and animal cells share many organelles (nucleus, mitochondria, endoplasmic reticulum, etc.), plant cells have unique structures including cell walls, chloroplasts, and large central vacuoles that animal cells lack.
explanation.bm: Walaupun sel tumbuhan dan haiwan berkongsi banyak organel (nukleus, mitokondria, retikulum endoplasma, dll.), sel tumbuhan mempunyai struktur unik termasuk dinding sel, kloroplas, dan vakuol pusat besar yang tidak ada pada sel haiwan.

hint.en: Think about the special structures that plants need for photosynthesis and structural support.
hint.bm: Fikirkan tentang struktur khas yang diperlukan tumbuhan untuk fotosintesis dan sokongan struktur.

subject: science
